mapper.select: select ID, TemplateID, Type, SubjectType, Number, SNumber, Notation, Title, ImageUrl, VideoUrl, Optional, Help, Layout, DispIndex, SelectionMax, SelectionMin, RowDisordered, MatrixPivot, RowLastFixed, ColDisordered, ColLastFixed, ColumnCount, BusinessType, ScoreType, RowReverse, ColReverse, ChartType, WaitBeforeNext, ReferSourceType, ReferFieldName, ReferQuestionID, Active, CreatedAt, CreatedBy, UpdatedAt, UpdatedBy from question where ID = #{id}
